author: jleroux
msg: * At some point I replaced flexadmin, previously used to protect things a bit, by admin (full rights). Because at this moment we had a script running everyday and things were cleaned up sufficiently. Hence it was not an issue. For the moment, as we do it by hand, I revert to flexadmin to avoid too much handling.
* I have also refactored the "All Known Demo Servers" which could maybe be removed
